Skills.Name: Continuato
Skills.Description: Reduces own DMG Received by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 15s. Further grants ongoing HP recovery by <color=red>{1}%</color> of ATK for 20s. Inflicts Provoke on all enemies for 15s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Reduces own DMG Received, grants ongoing HP recovery. Inflicts Provoke on all enemies

Skills.Name: Brilliance
Skills.Description: Shields DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> of skill user's ATK) of all allies (behind self) for 15s. Further grants Charge for 60s if Red Elemental.
Skills.ShortDescription: Shields DMG of all allies (behind self), grants Charge if Red Elemental

Skills.Name: Rondo del Giorno
Skills.Description: Grants Invincibility on all allies (behind self) for 5s. Raises DMG Inflicted for single Attacker ally with highest ATK by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 15s. Further raises ATK by <color=red>{2}%</color> for 15s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Grants Invincibility on all allies (behind self). Raises DMG Inflicted and ATK of single Attacker ally

Skills.Name: Strike Combo
Skills.Description: Reduces DMG Received for all allies by <color=red>5.00%-40.00%</color> for 5s according to Combo Bonus. Inflicts 100.00% DMG. Grants 2x Charge on single Attacker ally with highest ATK for 60s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Reduces DMG Received for all allies. Inflicts DMG on single enemy. Grants Charge on single Attacker ally

Skills.Name: Fifth White Shadow
Skills.Description: Each time DMG is received (CT 3s), grants Charge on first and second Red Elemental Attacker allies with highest ATK for 60s. Raises own Healing Boost by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 20s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time DMG is received, grants Charge on two Red Elemental Attacker allies. Raises own Healing Boost

Skills.Name: Continuato +
Skills.Description: Reduces own DMG Received by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 15s. Further grants ongoing HP recovery by <color=red>{1}%</color> of ATK for 20s. Inflicts Provoke on all enemies for 15s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Reduces own DMG Received, grants ongoing HP recovery. Inflicts Provoke on all enemies

Skills.Name: Brilliance +
Skills.Description: Shields DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> of skill user's ATK) of all allies (behind self) for 15s. Further grants 2x Charge for 60s if Red Elemental.
Skills.ShortDescription: Shields DMG of all allies (behind self), grants Charge if Red Elemental

Skills.Name: Rondo del Giorno +
Skills.Description: Grants Invincibility on all allies (behind self) for 5s. Raises DMG Inflicted for single Attacker ally with highest ATK by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 15s. Further raises ATK by <color=red>{2}%</color> for 15s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Grants Invincibility on all allies (behind self). Raises DMG Inflicted and ATK of single Attacker ally

Skills.Name: Fifth White Shadow +
Skills.Description: Each time DMG is received (CT 3s), grants 2x Charge on first and second Red Elemental Attacker allies with highest ATK for 60s. Raises own Healing Boost by <color=red>{2}%</color> for 20s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time DMG is received, grants Charge on two Red Elemental Attacker allies. Raises own Healing Boost

Skills.Name: Fifth White Shadow: Epsilon Only
Skills.Description: Each time Debuff is inflicted on ally (CT 5s), cancels <color=red>{0}</color> Debuff effect(s) on all allies.
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time Debuff is inflicted on ally, cancels Debuff effect(s) on all allies
